page.title: 19Events
page.content: A week of events, starting with the Carnival Queen crowning, included a Band concert. whist drive, Variety Show, disco, bingo and Race nite.held in a Marquee erected by the Inkpen gate was followed on Saturday evening by the Carnival procession.Floats together with Bands, Majorettes and individuals assembled by the Marquee and moved off at 6p.m. to parade round the town. The evening concluded with dancing to a Steel band with a Lamb Roast to sustain the inner man.All proceeds were given to various Hungerford Youth organisations. A successful Pantomine is held each year performed,directed by townsfolk. Floodlit Cricket Match which has its origins in Hungerford was rained off. John of School is the venue for dances variety concerts,band music,country and western music and choirs.
